org.cyclops.cyclopscore.infobook.pageelement

Class SectionAppendix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.infobook.pageelement.SectionAppendix
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvancementRewardsAppendix, ImageAppendix, KeyBindingAppendix, RecipeAppendix

    public abstract class SectionAppendix
extends java.lang.Object
    Separate elements that can be appended to sections.

      • drawScreen

        public void drawScreen(GuiInfoBook gui,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int width,
                       int height,
                       int page,
                       int mx,
                       int my,
                       boolean pre)
        Draw the appendix.
        Parameters:
        gui - The gui.
        x - Start X.
        y - Start Y.
        width - Max width.
        height - Max height.
        page - Current page.
        mx - Mouse X.
        my - Mouse Y.
        pre - If the normal drawing should occur, otherwise post-drawing: things like tooltips.
